title: Find Song Titles
original_prompt:
Revised Prompt: Assistance in Finding Song Titles: Help users who can't remember the title of a song. Provide the country and the year or date range, and then ask for the genre of music they are looking for. Based on their response, list at least 20 well-known songs produced in that country during the specified time period.

Suggestions:

Include popular songs from various genres such as pop, rock, trance, hip-hop, etc.
Highlight iconic songs that define the music scene of the specified country and time frame.
Consider adding a diverse range of artists and bands to cater to different musical tastes.
Questions:

What country are you interested in finding songs from?
Could you specify the exact year or a date range within your desired time period?
Is there any particular reason or occasion for searching these songs?
Reminder of options: Option 1: Read the output and provide more info or answer one or more of the questions. Option 2: Type "Use this prompt" and I will submit this as a query for you. Option 3: Type "Restart" to restart this process from the beginning. Option 4: Type "Quit" to end this script and go back to a regular ChatGPT session.
split_prompt:
This is a prompt description:```json
{
    "spliting prompt": {
        "assistance_type": [
            "Finding song titles"
        ],
        "user_requirements": [
            "country",
            "year or date range",
            "genre of music"
        ],
        "output_requirements": [
            "list at least 20 well-known songs",
            "include popular songs from various genres",
            "highlight iconic songs",
            "diverse range of artists and bands"
        ],
        "questions": [
            "What country are you interested in finding songs from?",
            "Could you specify the exact year or a date range within your desired time period?",
            "Is there any particular reason or occasion for searching these songs?"
        ],
        "options": [
            "Option 1: Read the output and provide more info or answer one or more of the questions.",
            "Option 2: Type 'Use this prompt' and I will submit this as a query for you.",
            "Option 3: Type 'Restart' to restart this process from the beginning.",
            "Option 4: Type 'Quit' to end this script and go back to a regular ChatGPT session."
        ]
    }
}
```
input1: Country: United States, Year Range: 1990-2000, Genre: Hip-Hop
input2: Country: United Kingdom, Year Range: 1980-1990, Genre: Rock
input1_ans:
Here are 20 well-known hip-hop songs produced in the United States between 1990 and 2000:

1. **"Nuthin' but a 'G' Thang"** - Dr. Dre (1992)
2. **"Juicy"** - The Notorious B.I.G. (1994)
3. **"California Love"** - 2Pac featuring Dr. Dre (1995)
4. **"Gangsta's Paradise"** - Coolio (1995)
5. **"C.R.E.A.M."** - Wu-Tang Clan (1993)
6. **"Hypnotize"** - The Notorious B.I.G. (1997)
7. **"Mo Money Mo Problems"** - The Notorious B.I.G. featuring Puff Daddy and Mase (1997)
8. **"Rosa Parks"** - OutKast (1998)
9. **"Gettin' Jiggy wit It"** - Will Smith (1997)
10. **"I Like It"** - Cardi B (1998)
11. **"Stan"** - Eminem featuring Dido (2000)
12. **"No Diggity"** - Blackstreet featuring Dr. Dre (1996)
13. **"Killing Me Softly"** - The Fugees (1996)
14. **"Big Pimpin'"** - Jay-Z featuring UGK (2000)
15. **"Ruff Ryders' Anthem"** - DMX (1998)
16. **"The Message"** - Grandmaster Flash and the Furious Five (1982, but influential in the 90s)
17. **"B.O.B."** - OutKast (2000)
18. **"Ice Ice Baby"** - Vanilla Ice (1990)
19. **"Ghetto Supastar"** - Pras featuring Ol' Dirty Bastard and Mýa (1998)
20. **"Still D.R.E."** - Dr. Dre featuring Snoop Dogg (1999)

If you need more information or have any other questions, feel free to ask!

input2_ans:
Here are 20 well-known rock songs from the United Kingdom produced between 1980 and 1990:

1. **"Another One Bites the Dust"** - Queen (1980)
2. **"Don't You (Forget About Me)"** - Simple Minds (1985)
3. **"Every Breath You Take"** - The Police (1983)
4. **"Sweet Child o' Mine"** - Guns N' Roses (1987)
5. **"With or Without You"** - U2 (1987)
6. **"Under Pressure"** - Queen & David Bowie (1981)
7. **"I Want to Break Free"** - Queen (1984)
8. **"Come on Eileen"** - Dexys Midnight Runners (1982)
9. **"Livin' on a Prayer"** - Bon Jovi (1986)
10. **"Time"** - Culture Club (1984)
11. **"Should I Stay or Should I Go"** - The Clash (1982)
12. **"You Spin Me Round (Like a Record)"** - Dead or Alive (1984)
13. **"Karma Chameleon"** - Culture Club (1983)
14. **"I Love Rock 'n' Roll"** - Joan Jett & the Blackhearts (1981)
15. **"Go Your Own Way"** - Fleetwood Mac (1977, but popular in the '80s)
16. **"The Final Countdown"** - Europe (1986)
17. **"Dancing in the Dark"** - Bruce Springsteen (1984)
18. **"In the Air Tonight"** - Phil Collins (1981)
19. **"West End Girls"** - Pet Shop Boys (1984)
20. **"The Boys of Summer"** - Don Henley (1984)

If you need more information or have any other questions, feel free to ask!
